channel.title: briefUpdatesMainNLpolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesMainNLpolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Pope Leo urges end to "pandemic of arms" after Minnesota shooting
item.description: Pope Leo XIV offered his prayers for the Minneapolis Catholic school shooting victims and called for an end to the "pandemic of arms, large and small"...

item.title: Giuliani hurt in crash after helping domestic violence victim, spokesperson says

item.title: Former Trump statistics chief slams Friday firing of Erika McEntarfer
item.description: Bill Beach said the president's suggestions that the jobs report was rigged betrayed a misunderstanding in how those numbers are assembled.

item.title: Trump fires statistics chief after soft jobs report
item.description: The monthly jobs report showed just 73,000 jobs in July, with big reductions to May's and June's numbers
